description: [``botocore``] This release adds support for using Provisioned Throughput with Bedrock Agents.

[``botocore``] This release adds 5 new APIs for managing attachments: StartAttachedFileUpload, CompleteAttachedFileUpload, GetAttachedFile, BatchGetAttachedFileMetadata, DeleteAttachedFile. These APIs can be used to programmatically upload and download attachments to Connect resources, like cases.
[``botocore``] This feature supports the release of Files related items
[``botocore``] Updated guidance on using private or self-signed certificate authorities (CAs) with AWS DataSync object storage locations.
[``botocore``] This release adds CSV format to GetCisScanReport for Inspector v2
[``botocore``] Amazon SageMaker Inference now supports m6i, c6i, r6i, m7i, c7i, r7i and g5 instance types for Batch Transform Jobs
[``botocore``] Adds support for specifying replacement headers per BulkEmailEntry in SendBulkEmail in SESv2.
